dcterms:creator: Jin-Young Yang
dcterms:description: A dataset sourced from the Korea Investor’s Network for Disclosure System (KIND) that includes continuous disclosures from Korean companies, specifically focusing on significant information that could influence the valuation of a company’s shares.
dcterms:title: Korea Investor’s Network for Disclosure System (KIND)

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of corporate disclosures from the top 50 publicly traded companies listed on the Korean KOSPI, focusing on their monthly disclosure summaries over a period of 17 months.
dcterms:title: KOSPI 50 Companies
